entry.title: A Font Family for Susy
entry.content:
The first drafts of the "GreenMud Susy" fonts are kerned, complete, and roughly in place. Susy chapters now use her font, JJ chapters use his, and the remainder is split until I flesh out a neutral "narrator" font.

Susy's fonts look like this:

  1. Susy Regular: The quick & brown fox jumps over the lazy god.
  2. Susy Bold: The quick & brown fox jumps over the lazy god.
  3. Susy SmallCaps: The quick & brown fox jumps over the lazy god.

JJ's fonts (created earlier) look like this:

  1. JJ Regular: The quick & brown fox jumps over the lazy god.
  2. JJ Bold: The quick & brown fox jumps over the lazy god.
  3. JJ Italic: The quick & brown fox jumps over the lazy god.
